entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The golden ball used in Quidditch, which Harry caught.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts who played Quidditch.

entities.name: flint
entities.description: A person who was commenting on Harry's catch and its aftermath.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: The person announcing the result of the Quidditch game.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts that won the Quidditch game.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who was suspected of cursing Harry's broomstick.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts who was making Harry a cup of tea.

relationships.description: Snape was suspected of cursing Harry's broomstick, as seen by Ron and Hermione.
Lee Jordan announced the result of the Quidditch game, which Gryffindor won.
